original_text: We were not looking for praise from people, not from you or anyone else, even though as apostles of Christ we could have asserted our authority.
korean_text: 또한 우리는 너희에게서든지 다른 이에게서든지 사람에게서는 영광을 구하지 아니하였노라

sentences.original_text: We were not looking for praise from people
not from you or anyone else
even though as apostles of Christ
we could have asserted our authority
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 권위를 주장할 수 있었음에도 불구하고
